metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3611 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the __kvm_migrate_pit_timer function inarch/x86/kvm/i8254.c in the KVM subsystem in the Linux kernel through3.17.2 allows guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS crash)by leveraging incorrect PIT emulation.A local guest user with access to the PIT i/o ports could use this flaw tocrash the host.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3611` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
